attributes.action: His Royal Majesty the king to dissolve parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
We the people and our forefathers built this country from the ground up, defended nations at times of need including ourselves, won two world wars, and others alike we have pride in our history 
We wish for His Royal Majesty the King to step in and hear the people's true voice and do the right thing before chaos ensumes, dissolve this parliament before This government destroys everything we fought for and worked for.
attributes.background: We the people of this country are have had enough of the lies, the U-turns and shear hypocrisy and treachery this government is carrying out, rejoining the ECJ etc the pensioners winter fuel allowance removal, the consistent lies on immigration and not doing anything about it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition that calls for the same action:

Call a General Election

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
